site.title: Agri Lacombe - Premium Quality Asparagus and Spanish Onions
site.description: Agri Lacombe, a family farm near Saint-Mathias-sur-Richelieu, Quebec, specializing in the sustainable cultivation of fresh, high-quality asparagus and Spanish onions.
hero.tagline: The Freshness of the Earth, from Our Family to Yours
hero.subtitle: Exceptional asparagus and Spanish onions, cultivated with passion and respect in Saint-Mathias-sur-Richelieu, Quebec.
story.title: Our Story: Passion and Terroir
commitments.title: Our Core Commitments
commitments.quality.title: Quality & Consistency
commitments.quality.text: An unwavering commitment to producing premium vegetables, season after season.
commitments.sustainability.title: Environmental Sustainability
commitments.sustainability.text: Implementing environmentally friendly farming practices to preserve our land.
commitments.innovation.title: Efficiency & Innovation
commitments.innovation.text: Optimizing resources and workflows through technology and smart planning.
products.title: Our Farm Products
products.asparagus.title: Fresh Quebec Asparagus
products.asparagus.description_short: Tender, flavorful spears, harvested fresh from our Quebec fields.
products.onions.title: Sweet & Savory Spanish Onions
products.onions.description_short: Large, mild, and juicy onions perfect for a variety of culinary uses.
products.onions.availability: Available from August to October (and in storage).
productInsights.title: Our Crops in Detail
productInsights.asparagus.title: Focus on Asparagus
productInsights.onions.title: Focus on Spanish Onions
sustainability.title: Our Commitment to Sustainability
whereToBuy.title: Where to Find Our Fresh Products
whereToBuy.availabilityNote: Availability varies by season. For wholesale inquiries, please contact us.

contact.title: Get in Touch
contact.intro: We'd love to hear from you! Whether you have questions about our products, wholesale inquiries, or just want to know more about our farm, please reach out.
